channel.title: Dialogue [Dementhium 639]

item.title: Dialogue [Dementhium 639]
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

if (player.getInventory().contains(1897)) { sendDialogue(player, CALM_TALK, -1, 12501, "Captain Tyr told me you lost something.."); } else if (player.getInventory().contains(19780)) { sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, -1, 12510, "I'm back."); } else { sendOptionDialogue(player, new int[]{14, -1}, "Can I buy some void?", "Nothing."); return true; }What is wrong with this?

When I have the items 1897 or 19780 they both go to case 12501
why is that?

Read full topic
